eu.cqse.check.framework.core.registry

Class CheckRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.core.registry.CheckRegistry

  • public class CheckRegistry
extends Object
    Registry singleton that manages custom checks.
    Version:
    $Rev: 55127 $
    Author:
    $Author: kinnen $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<CheckInfo> getChecksInfos()
      Returns a list of all registered checks.
      static CheckRegistry getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance.
      Collection<CheckInstance> instantiateChecks(List<String> identifiers)
      Creates check instances for the given check identifiers.
      void registerCheckClassDirectory(File classesDirectory)
      Registers the given bundle and loads all classes from the given bundle that implement CheckImplementationBase and are annotated with ACheck.
      void registerCheckDirectory(File customChecksDirectory)
      Registers the given directory of custom checks bundled as JAR files.

        Creates check instances for the given check identifiers.
        Throws:
        CheckException - if there is no check for one of the given identifiers
